message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth over $150 to me. I am looking to sell it for $200 in this round. Please let me know if this is within your budget.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $160. Can you meet me in the middle?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your offer of $160. In this round, I would like to propose a price of $180 for the product. This reflects the value I place on it while still being open to negotiation. Let me know if this works for you.
I'm still interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $160 and $180, so I'll offer $170. Can you consider that?

I understand your position, Bob. In this round, I would like to propose a price of $175 for the product. This is slightly above your last offer, reflecting its value to me, but I am open to further discussion. Please let me know if this is acceptable.
I'm still interested in the product, but $175 is getting close to my budget. I'll meet you halfway between $170 and $175, so I'll offer $172.50. Can you consider that?

I appreciate your continued interest in the product, Bob. Considering your latest offer, I would like to propose a price of $174 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise given its value to me. Let me know if this works for you.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I still think $174 is a bit high. I'll meet you halfway between $172.5 and $174, so I'll offer $173.25. Can you consider that?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. Given the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $173.75 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering our previous discussions. Please let me know if this is within your budget.
I'm really close to my budget, and I'm not sure I can go any higher. I'll offer $173, but that's as high as I can go. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll buy the product from you.
